label: Proposed management structure including clear lines of authority and communications
quote: Proposed management structure, including clear lines of authority and communications to perform the requirements of the SOW.

label: Description and diagram of structural connections or associations of responsible entities
quote: Description and diagram of the structural connections or associations of the entities responsible for this work with any corporate or division organizations

label: Proposed subcontracting arrangements and management approach
quote: Proposed subcontracting arrangements, if any, and the effectiveness of the proposed approach for managing these arrangements to assure that the Government receives services conforming to contract requirements.

label: Approach to performing requirements of the SOW
quote: Approach to performing the requirements of the SOW

label: Identification of management risk areas and recommended mitigation approaches
quote: Identification of management risk areas and recommended approaches to minimize the probability and impact of those risks.

label: Oral presentation shall not contain any price information
quote: The oral presentation shall not contain any price information.

label: Video or audio recording of oral presentations by quoters is strictly prohibited
quote: Video or audio recording of oral presentations by quoters is strictly prohibited.

label: By participating in the oral presentation, the Quoter acknowledges full compliance with all solicitation terms and conditions
quote: By participating in the oral presentation, the Quoter acknowledges that it is in full compliance with all solicitation terms and conditions, in accordance with applicable laws and statutes.

label: Web links to the Quoter specific web-based conference platform shall not be shared with anyone other than the authorized Government participants
quote: Web links to the Quoter specific web-based conference platform shall not be shared with anyone other than the authorized Government participants
